item.title: Halo or call of duty modern warefare 2?
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

OMG;; People here is saying that halo sucks when some say
halo is good and owns,

I think u guys should think over again and see whats the different

Halo : Is more a fantasy game with monsters, I mean it should not be 16+, but but
I got halo 1,2,3 and i just say the only halo game that sucks is HALO WARS (OMG SO NOOBY GAME)

Moder Warfare 2 : Is more a realistic game and have real weapons like Mp5, Uzi and Ak-47 etc…
i Have played CoD 1,2,3,4,5 and 6! They all got very fast popular and ya, (yes i got them all too)


So i say dont listen to the people that write Moder Warfare 2 sucks and halo sucks,,

/I WILL RECOMMEND TO TRY THEM BY YOURSELF/

One more thing ====
// I love them both //

Read full topic
